sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"足够的，充足的"之意。
means: adequate ：指数量上足够，质量上适当。
enough ：最普通用词，口语、书面语可用，较侧重分量或数量的足够，多指希望的满足。
sufficient ：正式用词，侧重数目或数量或程度达到某一特定要求或需要。

sentence.Network_en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
The plan is good; the problem is it doesn't go far enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 计划不错；问题在于不够深入。

sentence.Network_en: America has enough firepower in the area to mount sustained air strikes.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国在该地区拥有足够的火力发动持续的空中打击。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...的建筑材料。原文说早期的建筑材料种类少，只有木材、石头和砖块等，但并没有说数量上是不是“enough(足够)”，因此D选项错误。B选项是第四句的同义转换，也是关于建筑材料正确的回答。因此B选项正确.
新概念英语单词表带音标（第一册） - 豆丁网 ... easy 容易的 enough 足够的； paper 考卷.
滚你妈，用英语怎么说啊_百度知道 ... 6．加油！ go for it！ 7．够了！ enough！ 9．爱现！ showoff！.
That is blessing enough for anyone and I thank the people of Arizona for it ., 这对任何人而言足以称作恩赐 . 为此 , 我感谢亚利桑那州的人民!

list.abs: “Fair”的习惯用语-英语点津 ...  2. fair enough 有道理；说得对；敢情好.
《实用高中英语用法详解词典》_免费论文_当知网... ... fair trade 互惠贸易 / fair enough 好吧；有道理 a world fair 世界博览会 /.
Goodbye Lullaby_百度百科 ... 8. Everybody Hurts（ 爱让每个人都伤心） 9. Not Enough（ 爱不够（not enough）） 11. Darlin（ 亲爱的）.
新概念第三册精解 ... go back on one's word 食言 sure enough 果然，无疑 The comma 逗号的用法.
求英语高手帮帮忙啊！！！_百度知道 ... 13 建水厂 build a water factory 14 足够的时间 enough time 15 欣赏美景 enjoy the beauty.

phrase.cizu_name: enough is as good as a feast

jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)饱餐强似宴席，适中胜于过量

jx.jx_en_mean: there is no need to say more; all is understood
jx.jx_cn_mean: 无需再说；一切都明白了

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English genōg, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch genoeg and German genug

encyclopedia.content: enough意思 enough英音：[i'nʌf]美音：[ə'nʌf]词典解释 形容词 a. 1.足够的，充足的 We have enough chairs for everyone. 我们有足够的椅子让大家坐。 I was fool enough to trust him. 我真傻，竟会信赖他。 名词 n. 1.足够，充分[+to-v][(+for)] We earned enough to buy a new house. 我们挣的钱足够买一幢新房子。 I've had enough, thank you. 我够了，谢谢。 副词 ad. 1.足够地；充分地[+to-v]

entry.def: Enough means as much as you need or as much as is necessary.

example.ex: They had enough cash for a one-way ticket...
example.tran: 他们有足够的钱买单程票。

example.ex: There aren't enough tents to shelter them all.
example.tran: 没有足够的帐篷供他们容身。

entry.def: If you say that something is enough, you mean that you do not want it to continue any longer or get any worse.

example.ex: I met him only the once, and that was enough...
example.tran: 我就见过他那一次，那就让我受够了。

example.ex: I think I have said enough...
example.tran: 我想我已经说得够多了。

entry.def: You can use enough to say that something is the case to a moderate or fairly large degree.

example.ex: Winter is a common enough German surname...
example.tran: 温特是一个非常普通的德国姓氏。

example.ex: I got this phone call from a gentleman, who seemed sincere enough...
example.tran: 这个电话是一位绅士打来的，他似乎非常诚恳。

entry.def: You use enough in expressions such as strangely enough and interestingly enough to indicate that you think a fact is strange or interesting.

example.ex: Strangely enough, the last thing he thought of was his beloved Tanya...
example.tran: 说来也怪，他最后想到的才是他心爱的塔尼娅。

example.ex: Her latest conquest is an Italian who, interestingly enough, doesn't speak a word of his native language.
example.tran: 她新搭上了个意大利人。有意思的是，那个意大利人一句意大利语都不会说。

entry.def: If you say 'enough is enough', you mean that you want something that is happening to stop.

example.ex: Stop asking questions! You should know when enough is enough.
example.tran: 别问问题了！你应该知道什么时候该适可而止。

entry.def: If you say that you have had enough, you mean that you are unhappy with a situation and you want it to stop.

example.ex: I've had enough—there are limits even for the patience of a saint!...
example.tran: 我已经受够了——即使是圣人忍耐也是有限的！

example.ex: I had had enough of other people for one night.
example.tran: 我已经受够了别人搞一夜情。

entry.tran: 讲得够清楚了;不必再多说了
entry.def: If you say 'enough said', you mean that what you have just said is enough to make a point clear, and that there is no need to say any more.

example.ex: My husband is a jazz musician. Enough said.
example.tran: 我丈夫是位爵士音乐家，透露这一点就够了。

entry.tran: （尤指对孩子说）别再闹了，够了
entry.def: You say 'that's enough' to tell someone, especially a child, to stop behaving in a silly, noisy, or unpleasant way.

means.word_mean: 1. an adequate quantity; a quantity that is large enough to achieve a purpose;

sentences.sentence: "enough is as good as a feast"
"there is more than a sufficiency of lawyers in this country"
"Have I eaten enough?"; (`plenty' is nonstandard) "I've had plenty, thanks"

example.en: His ego is big enough to choke a horse.

auth_sentence.content: For us, second place is not good enough.
auth_sentence.res_content: For us, second place is not good enough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For us, second place is not good enough.

auth_sentence.content: But these detours aren't enough to rescue proceedings.
auth_sentence.res_content: But these detours aren't enough to rescue proceedings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But these detours aren't enough to rescue proceedings.

auth_sentence.content: It may be enough to scare them away forever.
auth_sentence.res_content: It may be enough to scare them away forever.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It may be enough to scare them away forever.

Sentence.sentence: Until ships became large enough (and engines small enough) to mount two engines side by side, they needed to keep sails.
Human control of fire goes back far enough (over a million years) that evolution could have produced a genetic leaning towards fire as a central aspect of human life
Books—especially books the average person could afford—haven't been around long enough to produce evolutionary change in humans.

sentences.en: She plays well enough for a beginner.
sentences.cn: 对于初学者来说, 她弹奏得已相当不错了。

means.word_mean: 充足的, 足够的, 充分的

sentences.en: Is ￡100 enough for all your expenses?

jushi.english: I was nearly drowned last night, but was fortunate enough to be saved.
jushi.chinese: 我昨天夜里差一点淹死,但真走运,有人把我救了。

jushi.english: He didn't run fast enough to catch the train.
jushi.chinese: 他跑得不够快,没有赶上火车。
